dct_title_s: Nova et recens emendata totius regni Ungariæ una cum adiacentibus et finitimis regionibus delineatio
dct_description_sm: C J Visscher; Joannes à Duetechum jun: fecit.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Scala Miliarium Germani" and "Scala Miliari Hungaria."
North oriented toward upper left of sheet.
Decorative cartouches, compass rose, coats of arms.
Shows Hapsburg and Ottoman holdings; tiny battle vignettes on map.
Features topography, lakes and rivers, vegetation.
From Blaeu’s Appendix theatri A. Ortelii et Atlantis G. Mercatoris, French edition, 1633.
